name: Arcus (crbac3217)
description: This is a personal 2.5D project made in unity using URP's 2D light and normal maps. I have created a modified pipeline based on Makin stuff look good's dead cells shader study. (you should check it out too!). It also has a playfab-based ranking system, which still needs a bit of work. All the items, characters, mobs, bosses, and the level system was created in a design that allows easy modification. Artworks will be updated as soon as I get some time to put my hands on this project again.
